Name: Robe Public Library, Local History Section

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment; closed Mon, public holidays and 12-1pm for lunch. Reference assistance available in person and by mail. Copying services for books, journals, photographs, newspapers, maps and plans.

About.Acquisition focus: Acquires records relating to the area and the people associated with it.

About.Major holdings: Buildings, People, Letters, Shipwrecks, Photographs 1840-. Cawthorne Collection: Letters, books, photographs, maps, newspaper cuttings, church and material 1840- .

About.References: Campbell, Roland 'Historical Records' RGSSA Proc Vol XLII, 1941 Stephen George Henty Pastoral Pioneers of South Australia, 198-199.
